plugin.name: dvdlpcmdec
plugin.description: Decode DVD LPCM frames into standard PCM

element.name: dvdlpcmdec
element.description: Decode DVD LPCM frames into standard PCM audio
element.author: Jan Schmidt <jan@noraisin.net>, Michael Smith <msmith@fluendo.com>

caps.name: sink
caps.details: audio/x-private1-lpcm; audio/x-lpcm, width=(int){ 16, 20, 24 }, rate=(int){ 32000, 44100, 48000, 96000 }, channels=(int)[ 1, 8 ], dynamic_range=(int)[ 0, 255 ], emphasis=(boolean){ true, false }, mute=(boolean){ true, false }

caps.name: src
caps.details: audio/x-raw, format=(string){ S16BE, S24BE }, layout=(string)interleaved, rate=(int){ 32000, 44100, 48000, 96000 }, channels=(int)[ 1, 8 ]
